body:
Boxlib has compile time knob for number of spatial dimensions.

I am adding a variant to boxlib like so...

    variant('dims', default=3, description='Number of spatial dimensions')

Ok, fine and good.

But, what is the syntax for having another package that depends on boxlib with dims set to 3?

I tried 

    depends_on('boxlib+dims=3') # how do we say 3D boxlib?

But, that doesn't work. Spack reports...
==> Error: Unexpected token
title: How do I specify numerical valued variants in depends_on statements
